full_summary:
# Museum Quality Display Cases
## Solicitation # WS4340074351

### Call for Bids
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified vendors to submit a proposal for the provision of Museum Quality Display Cases.

### Key Dates
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-12T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-19
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29

### Description
The successful vendor shall provide Museum Quality Display Cases that meet the requirements specified in the solicitation documents. The selected vendor will be responsible for designing, manufacturing, and delivering the display cases to the end-user entity.

### Evaluation Criteria
The proposals will be evaluated in accordance with the lowest price principle.

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Regions of Operation
The work will be performed in the region of Kingston, Ontario.

### Regions of Delivery
The delivery of the display cases will be made to the Department of National Defence (DND), located at 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Hannah Jeong at hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Solicitation Documents
The solicitation documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and supporting documentation, can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18326772?extsite=MTgzMjY3NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18326772?extsite=MTgzMjY3NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  

### Tender Closing TimelinE
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-01-12 at 14:00 hours EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 hours EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
